name: Beastly
description:
Kyle Kingson is the spoiled, shallow prince of his high school kingdom but when he humiliates a witch-like classmate, she retaliates by transforming him into someone as unattractive on the outside as he is on the inside. Now he has one year to find someone to love him in his new physical state - or he will remain “Beastly” forever. Play the companion video game to the exciting CBS Films motion picture and live the fantasy.

Features

• 7 3D environments from the movie
• 14 mini-games
• Collect pictures, biographies and movie clips
• You are not re-playing the movie scene by scene, you are living the story with your own character.
